content:
DisplayMode Enum

Definition

Defines identifiers that indicate the display modes used by ByteViewer.

In this Article

public enum DisplayMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
DisplayMode

Remarks

The DisplayMode identifiers are used to indicate the display mode used to display each byte sequence.

Fields

Ansi

An ANSI format display.
Auto

A display mode that automatically selects a display mode. In this mode, the bytes are examined to determine if they are hexadecimal or printable. If the bytes are in hexadecimal format, the Hexdump mode is selected. If the characters match a printable character set, a test is run to automatically select either the Ansi or Unicode display mode.
Hexdump

A hexadecimal format display.
Unicode

A Unicode format display.
